metric.name: GPUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of time GPU was busy.

metric.name: Wavefronts
metric.descr: Total wavefronts.

metric.name: VALUInsts
metric.descr: The average number of vector ALU instructions executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: SALUInsts
metric.descr: The average number of scalar ALU instructions executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: SFetchInsts
metric.descr: The average number of scalar fetch instructions from the video memory executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: GDSInsts
metric.descr: The average number of GDS read or GDS write instructions executed per work item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: MemUnitBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the memory unit is active. The result includes the stall time (MemUnitStalled). This is measured with all extra fetches and writes and any cache or memory effects taken into account. Value range: 0% to 100% (fetch-bound).

metric.name: ALUStalledByLDS
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime ALU units are stalled by the LDS input queue being full or the output queue being not ready. If there are LDS bank conflicts, reduce them. Otherwise, try reducing the number of LDS accesses if possible. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: TA_BUSY_avr
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Average over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_max
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Max over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_min
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Min over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_READ_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode reads processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_WRITE_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode writes processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TCC_HIT_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache hits. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_MISS_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache misses. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_MC_RDREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte reads. Sum over TCC instaces.

metric.name: TCC_MC_WRREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte transactions going over the TC_MC_wrreq interface. Sum over TCC instaces.

metric.name: TCC_WRREQ_STALL_max
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled. Max over TCC instances.

metric.name: FETCH_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WRITE_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes written to the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WRITE_REQ_32B
metric.descr: The total number of 32-byte effective memory writes.

metric.name: VFetchInsts
metric.descr: The average number of vector fetch instructions from the video memory executed per work-item (affected by flow control). Excludes FLAT instructions that fetch from video memory.

metric.name: VWriteInsts
metric.descr: The average number of vector write instructions to the video memory executed per work-item (affected by flow control). Excludes FLAT instructions that write to video memory.

metric.name: FlatVMemInsts
metric.descr: The average number of FLAT instructions that read from or write to the video memory executed per work item (affected by flow control). Includes FLAT instructions that read from or write to scratch.

metric.name: LDSInsts
metric.descr: The average number of LDS read or LDS write instructions executed per work item (affected by flow control). Excludes FLAT instructions that read from or write to LDS.

metric.name: FlatLDSInsts
metric.descr: The average number of FLAT instructions that read or write to LDS executed per work item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: VALUUtilization
metric.descr: The percentage of active vector ALU threads in a wave. A lower number can mean either more thread divergence in a wave or that the work-group size is not a multiple of 64. Value range: 0% (bad), 100% (ideal - no thread divergence).

metric.name: VALUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime vector ALU instructions are processed. Value range: 0% (bad) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: SALUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime scalar ALU instructions are processed. Value range: 0% (bad) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: FetchSize
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WriteSize
metric.descr: The total kilobytes written to the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: MemWrites32B
metric.descr: The total number of effective 32B write transactions to the memory

metric.name: L2CacheHit
metric.descr: The percentage of fetch, write, atomic, and other instructions that hit the data in L2 cache. Value range: 0% (no hit) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: MemUnitStalled
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the memory unit is stalled. Try reducing the number or size of fetches and writes if possible. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: WriteUnitStalled
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the Write unit is stalled. Value range: 0% to 100% (bad).

metric.name: LDSBankConflict
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime LDS is stalled by bank conflicts. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: GPUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of time GPU was busy.

metric.name: Wavefronts
metric.descr: Total wavefronts.

metric.name: VALUInsts
metric.descr: The average number of vector ALU instructions executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: SALUInsts
metric.descr: The average number of scalar ALU instructions executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: SFetchInsts
metric.descr: The average number of scalar fetch instructions from the video memory executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: GDSInsts
metric.descr: The average number of GDS read or GDS write instructions executed per work item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: MemUnitBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the memory unit is active. The result includes the stall time (MemUnitStalled). This is measured with all extra fetches and writes and any cache or memory effects taken into account. Value range: 0% to 100% (fetch-bound).

metric.name: ALUStalledByLDS
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime ALU units are stalled by the LDS input queue being full or the output queue being not ready. If there are LDS bank conflicts, reduce them. Otherwise, try reducing the number of LDS accesses if possible. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: TA_BUSY_avr
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Average over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_max
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Max over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_min
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Min over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_READ_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode reads processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_WRITE_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode writes processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TCC_HIT_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache hits. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_MISS_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache misses. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_RDREQ_32B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte TCC/EA read requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_RDREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of TCC/EA read requests (either 32-byte or 64-byte). Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WRREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of transactions (either 32-byte or 64-byte) going over the TC_EA_wrreq interface. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WRREQ_64B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 64-byte transactions going (64-byte write or CMPSWAP) over the TC_EA_wrreq interface. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_WRREQ_STALL_max
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled. Max over TCC instances.

metric.name: VFetchInsts
metric.descr: The average number of vector fetch instructions from the video memory executed per work-item (affected by flow control). Excludes FLAT instructions that fetch from video memory.

metric.name: VWriteInsts
metric.descr: The average number of vector write instructions to the video memory executed per work-item (affected by flow control). Excludes FLAT instructions that write to video memory.

metric.name: FlatVMemInsts
metric.descr: The average number of FLAT instructions that read from or write to the video memory executed per work item (affected by flow control). Includes FLAT instructions that read from or write to scratch.

metric.name: LDSInsts
metric.descr: The average number of LDS read or LDS write instructions executed per work item (affected by flow control). Excludes FLAT instructions that read from or write to LDS.

metric.name: FlatLDSInsts
metric.descr: The average number of FLAT instructions that read or write to LDS executed per work item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: VALUUtilization
metric.descr: The percentage of active vector ALU threads in a wave. A lower number can mean either more thread divergence in a wave or that the work-group size is not a multiple of 64. Value range: 0% (bad), 100% (ideal - no thread divergence).

metric.name: VALUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime vector ALU instructions are processed. Value range: 0% (bad) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: SALUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime scalar ALU instructions are processed. Value range: 0% (bad) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: FetchSize
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WriteSize
metric.descr: The total kilobytes written to the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: MemWrites32B
metric.descr: The total number of effective 32B write transactions to the memory

metric.name: L2CacheHit
metric.descr: The percentage of fetch, write, atomic, and other instructions that hit the data in L2 cache. Value range: 0% (no hit) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: MemUnitStalled
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the memory unit is stalled. Try reducing the number or size of fetches and writes if possible. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: WriteUnitStalled
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the Write unit is stalled. Value range: 0% to 100% (bad).

metric.name: LDSBankConflict
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime LDS is stalled by bank conflicts. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: TCC_EA1_RDREQ_32B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte TCC/EA read requests. Sum over TCC EA1s.

metric.name: TCC_EA1_RDREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of TCC/EA read requests (either 32-byte or 64-byte). Sum over TCC EA1s.

metric.name: TCC_EA1_WRREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of transactions (either 32-byte or 64-byte) going over the TC_EA_wrreq interface. Sum over TCC EA1s.

metric.name: TCC_EA1_WRREQ_64B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 64-byte transactions going (64-byte write or CMPSWAP) over the TC_EA_wrreq interface. Sum over TCC EA1s.

metric.name: TCC_WRREQ1_STALL_max
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled. Max over TCC instances.

metric.name: RDATA1_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured on EA1s.

metric.name: WDATA1_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes written to the video memory. This is measured on EA1s.

metric.name: FETCH_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WRITE_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes written to the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WRITE_REQ_32B
metric.descr: The total number of 32-byte effective memory writes.

metric.descr: The percentage of time GPU was busy.

metric.descr: The average number of LDS read or LDS write instructions executed per work item (affected by flow control). Excludes FLAT instructions that read from or write to LDS.

metric.descr: The average number of FLAT instructions that read or write to LDS executed per work item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: SALUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime scalar ALU instructions are processed. Value range: 0% (bad) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: FetchSize
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WriteSize
metric.descr: The total kilobytes written to the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: MemWrites32B
metric.descr: The total number of effective 32B write transactions to the memory

metric.name: L2CacheHit
metric.descr: The percentage of fetch, write, atomic, and other instructions that hit the data in L2 cache. Value range: 0% (no hit) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: MemUnitStalled
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the memory unit is stalled. Try reducing the number or size of fetches and writes if possible. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: WriteUnitStalled
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the Write unit is stalled. Value range: 0% to 100% (bad).

metric.name: LDSBankConflict
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime LDS is stalled by bank conflicts. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: TA_BUSY_avr
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Average over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_max
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Max over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_min
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Min over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_TA_BUSY_sum
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_TOTAL_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Total number of wavefronts processed by TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_ADDR_STALLED_BY_TC_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles addr path stalled by TC. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_ADDR_STALLED_BY_TD_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles addr path stalled by TD. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_DATA_STALLED_BY_TC_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles data path stalled by TC. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode wavfronts processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_READ_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode reads processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_WRITE_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode writes processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_ATOMIC_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode atomics processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer wavefronts processed by TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_READ_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer read wavefronts processed by TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_WRITE_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer write wavefronts processed by TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_ATOMIC_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer atomic wavefronts processed by TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_TOTAL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer cycles issued to TC. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_COALESCED_READ_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer coalesced read cycles issued to TC. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_COALESCED_WRITE_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer coalesced write cycles issued to TC. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TD_TD_BUSY_sum
metric.descr: TD is processing or waiting for data. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_TC_STALL_sum
metric.descr: TD is stalled waiting for TC data. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_LOAD_WAVEFRONT_sum
metric.descr: Count the wavefronts with opcode = load, include atomics and store. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_ATOMIC_WAVEFRONT_sum
metric.descr: Count the wavefronts with opcode = atomic. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_STORE_WAVEFRONT_sum
metric.descr: Count the wavefronts with opcode = store. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_COALESCABLE_WAVEFRONT_sum
metric.descr: Count wavefronts that TA finds coalescable. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_SPI_STALL_sum
metric.descr: TD is stalled SPI vinit, sum of TCP instances

metric.name: TCP_GATE_EN1_sum
metric.descr: TCP interface clocks are turned on. Not Windowed. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_GATE_EN2_sum
metric.descr: TCP core clocks are turned on. Not Windowed. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TD_TCP_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: TD stalls TCP. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCR_TCP_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: TCR stalls TCP_TCR_req interface. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_READ_TAGCONFLICT_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Tagram conflict stall on a read. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_WRITE_TAGCONFLICT_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Tagram conflict stall on a write. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_ATOMIC_TAGCONFLICT_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Tagram conflict stall on an atomic. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_VOLATILE_sum
metric.descr: Total number of L1 volatile pixels/buffers from TA. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_ACCESSES_sum
metric.descr: Total number of pixels/buffers from TA. Equals TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_READ+TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_NONREAD. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_READ_sum
metric.descr: Total number of read pixels/buffers from TA. Equals TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_HIT_LRU_READ + TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_MISS_LRU_READ + TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_MISS_EVICT_READ. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_WRITE_sum
metric.descr: Total number of local write pixels/buffers from TA. Equals TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_MISS_LRU_WRITE+ TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_MISS_EVICT_WRITE. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_ATOMIC_WITH_RET_sum
metric.descr: Total number of atomic with return pixels/buffers from TA. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_ATOMIC_WITHOUT_RET_sum
metric.descr: Total number of atomic without return pixels/buffers from TA Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_WRITEBACK_INVALIDATES_sum
metric.descr: Total number of cache invalidates. Equals TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_WBINVL1+ TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_WBINVL1_VOL+ TCP_PERF_SEL_CP_TCP_INVALIDATE+ TCP_PERF_SEL_SQ_TCP_INVALIDATE_VOL. Not Windowed. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_UTCL1_REQUEST_sum
metric.descr: Total CLIENT_UTCL1 NORMAL requests Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_UTCL1_TRANSLATION_MISS_sum
metric.descr: Total utcl1 translation misses Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_UTCL1_TRANSLATION_HIT_sum
metric.descr: Total utcl1 translation hits Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_UTCL1_PERMISSION_MISS_sum
metric.descr: Total utcl1 permission misses Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_CACHE_ACCESSES_sum
metric.descr: Count of total cache line (tag) accesses (includes hits and misses). Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCP_LATENCY_sum
metric.descr: Total TCP wave latency (from first clock of wave entering to first clock of wave leaving), divide by TA_TCP_STATE_READ to avg wave latency Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TA_TCP_STATE_READ_sum
metric.descr: Number of state reads Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_READ_REQ_LATENCY_sum
metric.descr: Total TCP->TCC request latency for reads and atomics with return. Not Windowed. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_WRITE_REQ_LATENCY_sum
metric.descr: Total TCP->TCC request latency for writes and atomics without return. Not Windowed. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_READ_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total read requests from TCP to all TCCs Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_WRITE_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total write requests from TCP to all TCCs Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_ATOMIC_WITH_RET_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total atomic with return requests from TCP to all TCCs Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_ATOMIC_WITHOUT_RET_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total atomic without return requests from TCP to all TCCs Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_NC_READ_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total read requests with NC mtype from this TCP to all TCCs Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_NC_WRITE_RWriteUnitStalledQ_sum
metric.descr: Total write requests with RW mtype from this TCP to all TCCs. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_RW_WRITE_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total write requests with RW mtype from this TCP to all TCCs. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_RW_ATOMIC_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total atomic requests with RW mtype from this TCP to all TCCs. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_PENDING_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Stall due to data pending from L2. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCA_CYCLE_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles. Sum over all TCA instances

metric.name: TCA_BUSY_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles we have a request pending. Sum over all TCA instances.

metric.name: TCC_BUSY_avr
metric.descr: TCC_BUSY avr over all memory channels.

metric.name: TCC_WRREQ_STALL_max
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled. Max over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_CYCLE_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles. Not windowable. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_BUSY_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles we have a request pending. Not windowable. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of requests of all types. This is measured at the tag block. This may be more than the number of requests arriving at the TCC, but it is a good indication of the total amount of work that needs to be performed. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_STREAMING_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of streaming requests. This is measured at the tag block. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_NC_REQ_sum
metric.descr: The number of noncoherently cached requests. This is measured at the tag block. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_UC_REQ_sum
metric.descr: The number of uncached requests. This is measured at the tag block. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_CC_REQ_sum
metric.descr: The number of coherently cached requests. This is measured at the tag block. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_RW_REQ_sum
metric.descr: The number of RW requests. This is measured at the tag block. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_PROBE_sum
metric.descr: Number of probe requests. Not windowable. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_PROBE_ALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of external probe requests with with EA_TCC_preq_all== 1. Not windowable. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_READ_sum
metric.descr: Number of read requests. Compressed reads are included in this, but metadata reads are not included. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_WRITE_sum
metric.descr: Number of write requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_ATOMIC_sum
metric.descr: Number of atomic requests of all types. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_HIT_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache hits. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_MISS_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache misses. UC reads count as misses. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_WRITEBACK_sum
metric.descr: Number of lines written back to main memory. This includes writebacks of dirty lines and uncached write/atomic requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WRREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of transactions (either 32-byte or 64-byte) going over the TC_EA_wrreq interface. Atomics may travel over the same interface and are generally classified as write requests. This does not include probe commands. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WRREQ_64B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 64-byte transactions going (64-byte write or CMPSWAP) over the TC_EA_wrreq interface. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WR_UNCACHED_32B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte write/atomic going over the TC_EA_wrreq interface due to uncached traffic. Note that CC mtypes can produce uncached requests, and those are included in this. A 64-byte request will be counted as 2. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WRREQ_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WRREQ_IO_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles a EA write request was stalled because the interface was out of IO credits. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WRREQ_GMI_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles a EA write request was stalled because the interface was out of GMI credits. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WRREQ_DRAM_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles a EA write request was stalled because the interface was out of DRAM credits. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_TOO_MANY_EA_WRREQS_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles the TCC could not send a EA write request because it already reached its maximum number of pending EA write requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WRREQ_LEVEL_sum
metric.descr: The sum of the number of EA write requests in flight. This is primarily meant for measure average EA write latency. Average write latency = TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_WRREQ_LEVEL/TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_WRREQ. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_RDREQ_LEVEL_sum
metric.descr: The sum of the number of TCC/EA read requests in flight. This is primarily meant for measure average EA read latency. Average read latency = TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_RDREQ_LEVEL/TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_RDREQ. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_ATOMIC_sum
metric.descr: Number of transactions going over the TC_EA_wrreq interface that are actually atomic requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_ATOMIC_LEVEL_sum
metric.descr: The sum of the number of EA atomics in flight. This is primarily meant for measure average EA atomic latency. Average atomic latency = TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_WRREQ_ATOMIC_LEVEL/TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_WRREQ_ATOMIC. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_RDREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of TCC/EA read requests (either 32-byte or 64-byte) Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_RDREQ_32B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte TCC/EA read requests Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_RD_UNCACHED_32B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte TCC/EA read due to uncached traffic. A 64-byte request will be counted as 2 Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_RDREQ_IO_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles there was a stall because the read request interface was out of IO credits. Stalls occur regardless of whether a read needed to be performed or not. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_RDREQ_GMI_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles there was a stall because the read request interface was out of GMI credits. Stalls occur regardless of whether a read needed to be performed or not. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_RDREQ_DRAM_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles there was a stall because the read request interface was out of DRAM credits. Stalls occur regardless of whether a read needed to be performed or not. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_NORMAL_WRITEBACK_sum
metric.descr: Number of writebacks due to requests that are not writeback requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_ALL_TC_OP_WB_WRITEBACK_sum
metric.descr: Number of writebacks due to all TC_OP writeback requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_NORMAL_EVICT_sum
metric.descr: Number of evictions due to requests that are not invalidate or probe requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_ALL_TC_OP_INV_EVICT_sum
metric.descr: Number of evictions due to all TC_OP invalidate requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_RDREQ_DRAM_sum
metric.descr: Number of TCC/EA read requests (either 32-byte or 64-byte) destined for DRAM (MC). Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA_WRREQ_DRAM_sum
metric.descr: Number of TCC/EA write requests (either 32-byte of 64-byte) destined for DRAM (MC). Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: FETCH_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WRITE_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes written to the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WRITE_REQ_32B
metric.descr: The total number of 32-byte effective memory writes.

metric.name: GPUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of time GPU was busy.

metric.name: Wavefronts
metric.descr: Total wavefronts.

metric.name: VALUInsts
metric.descr: The average number of vector ALU instructions executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: SALUInsts
metric.descr: The average number of scalar ALU instructions executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: SFetchInsts
metric.descr: The average number of scalar fetch instructions from the video memory executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: GDSInsts
metric.descr: The average number of GDS read or GDS write instructions executed per work item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: MemUnitBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the memory unit is active. The result includes the stall time (MemUnitStalled). This is measured with all extra fetches and writes and any cache or memory effects taken into account. Value range: 0% to 100% (fetch-bound).

metric.name: ALUStalledByLDS
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime ALU units are stalled by the LDS input queue being full or the output queue being not ready. If there are LDS bank conflicts, reduce them. Otherwise, try reducing the number of LDS accesses if possible. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: VFetchInsts
metric.descr: The average number of vector fetch instructions from the video memory executed per work-item (affected by flow control). Excludes FLAT instructions that fetch from video memory.

metric.name: VWriteInsts
metric.descr: The average number of vector write instructions to the video memory executed per work-item (affected by flow control). Excludes FLAT instructions that write to video memory.

metric.name: VALUUtilization
metric.descr: The percentage of active vector ALU threads in a wave. A lower number can mean either more thread divergence in a wave or that the work-group size is not a multiple of 64. Value range: 0% (bad), 100% (ideal - no thread divergence).

metric.name: VALUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime vector ALU instructions are processed. Value range: 0% (bad) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: SALUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime scalar ALU instructions are processed. Value range: 0% (bad) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: FetchSize
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WriteSize
metric.descr: The total kilobytes written to the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: MemWrites32B
metric.descr: The total number of effective 32B write transactions to the memory

metric.name: L2CacheHit
metric.descr: The percentage of fetch, write, atomic, and other instructions that hit the data in L2 cache. Value range: 0% (no hit) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: MemUnitStalled
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the memory unit is stalled. Try reducing the number or size of fetches and writes if possible. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: WriteUnitStalled
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the Write unit is stalled. Value range: 0% to 100% (bad).

metric.name: LDSBankConflict
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime LDS is stalled by bank conflicts. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: TA_BUSY_avr
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Average over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_max
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Max over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_min
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Min over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_TA_BUSY_sum
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_TOTAL_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Total number of wavefronts processed by TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_ADDR_STALLED_BY_TC_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles addr path stalled by TC. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_ADDR_STALLED_BY_TD_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles addr path stalled by TD. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_DATA_STALLED_BY_TC_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles data path stalled by TC. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode wavfronts processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_READ_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode reads processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_WRITE_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode writes processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_ATOMIC_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode atomics processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer wavefronts processed by TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_READ_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer read wavefronts processed by TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_WRITE_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer write wavefronts processed by TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_ATOMIC_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer atomic wavefronts processed by TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_TOTAL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer cycles issued to TC. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_COALESCED_READ_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer coalesced read cycles issued to TC. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_COALESCED_WRITE_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer coalesced write cycles issued to TC. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TD_TD_BUSY_sum
metric.descr: TD is processing or waiting for data. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_TC_STALL_sum
metric.descr: TD is stalled waiting for TC data. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_LOAD_WAVEFRONT_sum
metric.descr: Count the wavefronts with opcode = load, include atomics and store. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_ATOMIC_WAVEFRONT_sum
metric.descr: Count the wavefronts with opcode = atomic. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_STORE_WAVEFRONT_sum
metric.descr: Count the wavefronts with opcode = store. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_COALESCABLE_WAVEFRONT_sum
metric.descr: Count wavefronts that TA finds coalescable. Sum over TD instances.

metric.name: TD_SPI_STALL_sum
metric.descr: TD is stalled SPI vinit, sum of TCP instances

metric.name: TCP_GATE_EN1_sum
metric.descr: TCP interface clocks are turned on. Not Windowed. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_GATE_EN2_sum
metric.descr: TCP core clocks are turned on. Not Windowed. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TD_TCP_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: TD stalls TCP. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCR_TCP_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: TCR stalls TCP_TCR_req interface. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_READ_TAGCONFLICT_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Tagram conflict stall on a read. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_WRITE_TAGCONFLICT_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Tagram conflict stall on a write. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_ATOMIC_TAGCONFLICT_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Tagram conflict stall on an atomic. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_VOLATILE_sum
metric.descr: Total number of L1 volatile pixels/buffers from TA. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_ACCESSES_sum
metric.descr: Total number of pixels/buffers from TA. Equals TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_READ+TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_NONREAD. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_READ_sum
metric.descr: Total number of read pixels/buffers from TA. Equals TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_HIT_LRU_READ + TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_MISS_LRU_READ + TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_MISS_EVICT_READ. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_WRITE_sum
metric.descr: Total number of local write pixels/buffers from TA. Equals TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_MISS_LRU_WRITE+ TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_MISS_EVICT_WRITE. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_ATOMIC_WITH_RET_sum
metric.descr: Total number of atomic with return pixels/buffers from TA. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_ATOMIC_WITHOUT_RET_sum
metric.descr: Total number of atomic without return pixels/buffers from TA Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_WRITEBACK_INVALIDATES_sum
metric.descr: Total number of cache invalidates. Equals TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_WBINVL1+ TCP_PERF_SEL_TOTAL_WBINVL1_VOL+ TCP_PERF_SEL_CP_TCP_INVALIDATE+ TCP_PERF_SEL_SQ_TCP_INVALIDATE_VOL. Not Windowed. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_UTCL1_REQUEST_sum
metric.descr: Total CLIENT_UTCL1 NORMAL requests Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_UTCL1_TRANSLATION_MISS_sum
metric.descr: Total utcl1 translation misses Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_UTCL1_TRANSLATION_HIT_sum
metric.descr: Total utcl1 translation hits Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_UTCL1_PERMISSION_MISS_sum
metric.descr: Total utcl1 permission misses Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TOTAL_CACHE_ACCESSES_sum
metric.descr: Count of total cache line (tag) accesses (includes hits and misses). Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TA_TCP_STATE_READ_sum
metric.descr: Number of state reads Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_READ_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total read requests from TCP to all TCCs Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_WRITE_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total write requests from TCP to all TCCs Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_ATOMIC_WITH_RET_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total atomic with return requests from TCP to all TCCs Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_ATOMIC_WITHOUT_RET_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total atomic without return requests from TCP to all TCCs Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_NC_READ_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total read requests with NC mtype from this TCP to all TCCs Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_NC_WRITE_RWriteUnitStalledQ_sum
metric.descr: Total write requests with RW mtype from this TCP to all TCCs. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_RW_WRITE_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total write requests with RW mtype from this TCP to all TCCs. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_TCC_RW_ATOMIC_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Total atomic requests with RW mtype from this TCP to all TCCs. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCP_PENDING_STALL_CYCLES_sum
metric.descr: Stall due to data pending from L2. Sum over TCP instances.

metric.name: TCA_CYCLE_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles. Sum over all TCA instances

metric.name: TCA_BUSY_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles we have a request pending. Sum over all TCA instances.

metric.name: TCC_BUSY_avr
metric.descr: TCC_BUSY avr over all memory channels.

metric.name: TCC_WRREQ_STALL_max
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled. Max over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_CYCLE_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles. Not windowable. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_BUSY_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles we have a request pending. Not windowable. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of requests of all types. This is measured at the tag block. This may be more than the number of requests arriving at the TCC, but it is a good indication of the total amount of work that needs to be performed. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_STREAMING_REQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of streaming requests. This is measured at the tag block. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_NC_REQ_sum
metric.descr: The number of noncoherently cached requests. This is measured at the tag block. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_UC_REQ_sum
metric.descr: The number of uncached requests. This is measured at the tag block. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_CC_REQ_sum
metric.descr: The number of coherently cached requests. This is measured at the tag block. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_RW_REQ_sum
metric.descr: The number of RW requests. This is measured at the tag block. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_PROBE_sum
metric.descr: Number of probe requests. Not windowable. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_PROBE_ALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of external probe requests with with EA_TCC_preq_all== 1. Not windowable. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_READ_sum
metric.descr: Number of read requests. Compressed reads are included in this, but metadata reads are not included. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_WRITE_sum
metric.descr: Number of write requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_ATOMIC_sum
metric.descr: Number of atomic requests of all types. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_HIT_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache hits. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_MISS_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache misses. UC reads count as misses. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_WRITEBACK_sum
metric.descr: Number of lines written back to main memory. This includes writebacks of dirty lines and uncached write/atomic requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_WRREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of transactions (either 32-byte or 64-byte) going over the TC_EA_wrreq interface. Atomics may travel over the same interface and are generally classified as write requests. This does not include probe commands. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_WRREQ_64B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 64-byte transactions going (64-byte write or CMPSWAP) over the TC_EA_wrreq interface. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_WR_UNCACHED_32B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte write/atomic going over the TC_EA_wrreq interface due to uncached traffic. Note that CC mtypes can produce uncached requests, and those are included in this. A 64-byte request will be counted as 2. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_WRREQ_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_WRREQ_IO_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles a EA write request was stalled because the interface was out of IO credits. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_WRREQ_GMI_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles a EA write request was stalled because the interface was out of GMI credits. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_WRREQ_DRAM_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles a EA write request was stalled because the interface was out of DRAM credits. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_TOO_MANY_EA_WRREQS_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles the TCC could not send a EA write request because it already reached its maximum number of pending EA write requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_WRREQ_LEVEL_sum
metric.descr: The sum of the number of EA write requests in flight. This is primarily meant for measure average EA write latency. Average write latency = TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_WRREQ_LEVEL/TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_WRREQ. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_RDREQ_LEVEL_sum
metric.descr: The sum of the number of TCC/EA read requests in flight. This is primarily meant for measure average EA read latency. Average read latency = TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_RDREQ_LEVEL/TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_RDREQ. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_ATOMIC_sum
metric.descr: Number of transactions going over the TC_EA_wrreq interface that are actually atomic requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_ATOMIC_LEVEL_sum
metric.descr: The sum of the number of EA atomics in flight. This is primarily meant for measure average EA atomic latency. Average atomic latency = TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_WRREQ_ATOMIC_LEVEL/TCC_PERF_SEL_EA_WRREQ_ATOMIC. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_RDREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of TCC/EA read requests (either 32-byte or 64-byte) Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_RDREQ_32B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte TCC/EA read requests Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_RD_UNCACHED_32B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte TCC/EA read due to uncached traffic. A 64-byte request will be counted as 2 Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_RDREQ_IO_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles there was a stall because the read request interface was out of IO credits. Stalls occur regardless of whether a read needed to be performed or not. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_RDREQ_GMI_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles there was a stall because the read request interface was out of GMI credits. Stalls occur regardless of whether a read needed to be performed or not. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_RDREQ_DRAM_CREDIT_STALL_sum
metric.descr: Number of cycles there was a stall because the read request interface was out of DRAM credits. Stalls occur regardless of whether a read needed to be performed or not. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_NORMAL_WRITEBACK_sum
metric.descr: Number of writebacks due to requests that are not writeback requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_ALL_TC_OP_WB_WRITEBACK_sum
metric.descr: Number of writebacks due to all TC_OP writeback requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_NORMAL_EVICT_sum
metric.descr: Number of evictions due to requests that are not invalidate or probe requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_ALL_TC_OP_INV_EVICT_sum
metric.descr: Number of evictions due to all TC_OP invalidate requests. Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_RDREQ_DRAM_sum
metric.descr: Number of TCC/EA read requests (either 32-byte or 64-byte) destined for DRAM (MC). Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: TCC_EA0_WRREQ_DRAM_sum
metric.descr: Number of TCC/EA write requests (either 32-byte of 64-byte) destined for DRAM (MC). Sum over TCC instances.

metric.name: FETCH_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WRITE_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes written to the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WRITE_REQ_32B
metric.descr: The total number of 32-byte effective memory writes.

metric.name: GPUBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of time GPU was busy.

metric.name: Wavefronts
metric.descr: Total wavefronts.

metric.name: VALUInsts
metric.descr: The average number of vector ALU instructions executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: SALUInsts
metric.descr: The average number of scalar ALU instructions executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: SFetchInsts
metric.descr: The average number of scalar fetch instructions from the video memory executed per work-item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: GDSInsts
metric.descr: The average number of GDS read or GDS write instructions executed per work item (affected by flow control).

metric.name: MemUnitBusy
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the memory unit is active. The result includes the stall time (MemUnitStalled). This is measured with all extra fetches and writes and any cache or memory effects taken into account. Value range: 0% to 100% (fetch-bound).

metric.name: ALUStalledByLDS
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime ALU units are stalled by the LDS input queue being full or the output queue being not ready. If there are LDS bank conflicts, reduce them. Otherwise, try reducing the number of LDS accesses if possible. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: GPU_UTIL
metric.descr: Percentage of the time that GUI is active

metric.name: CP_UTIL
metric.descr: Percentage of the GRBM_GUI_ACTIVE time that any of the Command Processor (CPG/CPC/CPF) blocks are busy

metric.name: SPI_UTIL
metric.descr: Percentage of the GRBM_GUI_ACTIVE time that any of the Shader Pipe Interpolators (SPI) are busy in the shader engine(s)

metric.name: TA_UTIL
metric.descr: Percentage of the GRBM_GUI_ACTIVE time that any of the Texture Pipes (TA) are busy in the shader engine(s).

metric.name: GDS_UTIL
metric.descr: Percentage of the GRBM_GUI_ACTIVE time that the Global Data Share (GDS) is busy.

metric.name: EA_UTIL
metric.descr: Percentage of the GRBM_GUI_ACTIVE time that the Efficiency Arbiter (EA) block is busy.

metric.name: WAVE_DEP_WAIT
metric.descr: Percentage of the SQ_WAVE_CYCLE time spent waiting for anything.

metric.name: WAVE_ISSUE_WAIT
metric.descr: Percentage of the SQ_WAVE_CYCLE time spent waiting for any instruction issue.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_avr
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Average over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_max
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Max over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_min
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Min over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_LOAD_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat load vec32 packets processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_STORE_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of flat store vec32 packets processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: GL2C_HIT_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache hits. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_MISS_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache misses. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_EA_RDREQ_32B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte GL2C/EA read requests. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_EA_RDREQ_64B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 64-byte GL2C/EA read requests. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_EA_RDREQ_96B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 96-byte GL2C/EA read requests. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_EA_RDREQ_128B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 128-byte GL2C/EA read requests. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_MC_RDREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of GL2C/EA read requests (either 32-byte or 64-byte or 128-byte). Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_MC_WRREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of transactions (either 32-byte or 64-byte) going over the GL2C_MC_wrreq interface. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_EA_WRREQ_64B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 64-byte transactions going (64-byte write or CMPSWAP) over the GL2C_EA_wrreq interface. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_WRREQ_STALL_max
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled. Max over GL2C instances.

metric.name: L2CacheHit
metric.descr: The percentage of fetch, write, atomic, and other instructions that hit the data in L2 cache. Value range: 0% (no hit) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: FETCH_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WriteUnitStalled
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the Write unit is stalled. Value range: 0% to 100% (bad).

metric.name: LDSBankConflict
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime LDS is stalled by bank conflicts. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).

metric.name: GPU_UTIL
metric.descr: Percentage of the time that GUI is active

metric.name: WAVE_DEP_WAIT
metric.descr: Percentage of the SQ_WAVE_CYCLE time spent waiting for anything.

metric.name: WAVE_ISSUE_WAIT
metric.descr: Percentage of the SQ_WAVE_CYCLE time spent waiting for any instruction issue.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_avr
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Average over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_max
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Max over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUSY_min
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Min over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_LOAD_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer load vec32 packets processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: TA_BUFFER_STORE_WAVEFRONTS_sum
metric.descr: Number of buffer store vec32 packets processed by the TA. Sum over TA instances.

metric.name: GL2C_HIT_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache hits. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_MISS_sum
metric.descr: Number of cache misses. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_EA_RDREQ_32B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte GL2C/EA read requests. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_EA_RDREQ_64B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 64-byte GL2C/EA read requests. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_EA_RDREQ_96B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 96-byte GL2C/EA read requests. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_EA_RDREQ_128B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 128-byte GL2C/EA read requests. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_MC_RDREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of GL2C/EA read requests (either 32-byte or 64-byte or 128-byte). Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_MC_WRREQ_sum
metric.descr: Number of transactions (either 32-byte or 64-byte) going over the GL2C_MC_wrreq interface. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_EA_WRREQ_64B_sum
metric.descr: Number of 64-byte transactions going (64-byte write or CMPSWAP) over the GL2C_EA_wrreq interface. Sum over GL2C instances.

metric.name: GL2C_WRREQ_STALL_max
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled. Max over GL2C instances.

metric.name: L2CacheHit
metric.descr: The percentage of fetch, write, atomic, and other instructions that hit the data in L2 cache. Value range: 0% (no hit) to 100% (optimal).

metric.name: FETCH_SIZE
metric.descr: The total kilobytes fetched from the video memory. This is measured with all extra fetches and any cache or memory effects taken into account.

metric.name: WriteUnitStalled
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime the Write unit is stalled. Value range: 0% to 100% (bad).

metric.name: LDSBankConflict
metric.descr: The percentage of GPUTime LDS is stalled by bank conflicts. Value range: 0% (optimal) to 100% (bad).
